ProductInfo.Features:
600 TV lines resolution, 1/3" PixelPlus image sensor, 2.8-12mm varifocal lens
42 pcs IR LEDs with IR effective distance up to 120ft, good for outdoor and night-time applications. DC 12V input voltage. Chasis Material: aluminum housing. Color: white. Auto white balance
Video System: NTSC. Video Scanning Type: 2 to 1 interlace. Video Output: 1 BNC, 1.0 Vp-p, 75 Ohm composite
Power consumption: less than 2W (LED OFF) / less than 6W (LED ON). Weather Protection: IP 66
Product dimension: 10"(L) x 4"(W) x 6"(H). Operating Temperature: 14°F ~ 122 °F. Storage Temperature: 4°F ~ 144 °F.
ProductInfo.Name: R-Tech Outdoor/Indoor Security CCTV Bullet Camera DC 12V power 600 TVL Day/Night Vision with 42 pcs IR LEDs 2.8-12mm Varifocal Lens, Weather-Resistant and Vandal-Proof
